commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
version: '3.8'

services:

  backend:
    build: ./backend
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
    environment:
      - MONGO_URI=mongodb://mongo:27017/mydatabase
    depends_on:
      - mongo
    volumes:
      - ./backend:/app
      - /app/node_modules

  frontend:
    build: ./frontend
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    volumes:
      - ./frontend:/app
      - /app/node_modules

  mongo:
    image: mongo:7.0
    container_name: mongodb
    ports:
      - "27017:27017"
    volumes:
      - mongodb_data:/data/db

volumes:
  mongodb_data:
